top_examples.content: Bret Taylor's new venture Sierra.AI is pushing boundaries. Having worked with him at Salesforce, I'm excited to see what comes next. Exciting times in the CRM industry....

top_examples.content: Marc Benioff's vision for Agentforce is compelling. As someone working in CRM, I see the potential for AI agents to revolutionize customer service. The competition is heating up in this space....

top_examples.content: While Agentforce shows promise, implementation challenges remain. Integration with existing systems and data privacy concerns need addressing. Looking forward to seeing how this evolves....
